resources.string:
Working as an Android Developer in JioSphere, A Chromium Engine based browser with 1 Cr+ downloads, and experienced in Java/Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Jetpack Components, Room/Sqlite Db, Retrofit.
Developed a feature for storage for all incoming Notifications and displaying them using Room Db, Coroutines and Jetpack Compose:

 Enhanced performance for scrolling by stopping re-compositions of views and similarly for Storing and Fetching data from Db and implemented various other Screens in Jetpack Compose.

Developed Browser Sync Feature where implemented various Sync Api (REST Api) using Retrofit where all clients can Upload/Download data and showcase in Clientâ€™s device.
Software Development Engineer, June 2021 - Present | JIO Platform Ltd., Bangalore
